sys_ui_macro.name: s3view
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g2:evaluate>
var table = current.getTableName();
var sysid = current.sys_id;
</g2:evaluate>
<iframe id="s3ViewFrame" onload="setIframeHeight(this.id)" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" style="width: 100%;" src="x_snc_as_s3view.do?sysparm_table=$[table]&sysparm_sys_id=$[sysid]"/>
<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
	function getDocHeight(doc) {
		doc = doc || document;
		// stackoverflow.com/questions/1145850/
		var body = doc.body, html = doc.documentElement;
		var height = Math.max( body.scrollHeight, body.offsetHeight, 
			html.clientHeight, html.scrollHeight, html.offsetHeight );
		return height;
	}
	
	function setIframeHeight(id) {
		var ifrm = document.getElementById(id);
		var doc = ifrm.contentDocument? ifrm.contentDocument: 
			ifrm.contentWindow.document;
		ifrm.style.visibility = 'hidden';
		ifrm.style.height = "600px"; // reset to minimal height ...
		// IE opt. for bing/msn needs a bit added or scrollbar appears
		ifrm.style.height = getDocHeight( doc ) + 4 + "px";
		ifrm.style.visibility = 'visible';
	}

	function reloadS3Frame(url) {
		var frame = gel('s3ViewFrame');
	    var doc = frame.contentDocument? frame.contentDocument:frame.contentWindow.document;
		doc.location.reload();
	}
</script>
</j:jelly>
